abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by cabaret singer Amanda McBroom at the Metropolitan Room.
snippet: Amanda McBroom, the Los Angeles cabaret singer and composer of “The Rose,” is performing at the Metropolitan Room.
lead_paragraph: Amanda McBroom, the Los Angeles cabaret singer and composer of “The Rose,” is performing at the Metropolitan Room.

headline.main: An Eternal Optimist Plumbs Some Demons
headline.print_headline: An Eternal Optimist Plumbs Some Demons
headline.seo: Amanda McBroom at the Metropolitan Room - Review
